title: Verint systems raises ARR outlook to $768M for FY2026 driven by AI momentum
excerpt: Discover Verint Systems' Q4 2025 highlights: accelerated AI-driven ARR growth, record SaaS ACV bookings, and fiscal 2026 outlook with 8% projected ARR growth.
text: Earnings Call Insights: Verint Systems Inc. Earnings Call Insights: Verint Systems Inc. (VRNT) Q4 2025

Management View

  • CEO Dan Bodner highlighted strong AI momentum, with annual recurring revenue (ARR) growth reaching 5% in Q4, surpassing prior guidance of 4%. He stated that ARR growth accelerated each quarter last year, driven by customer adoption
